author: cms-btv-pog
body: PATSecondaryVertexSlimmer now works with candidate-based IVF secondary vertices produced in the standard Reco in 74X and stores them in MiniAOD with re-keyed Ptrs to PackedCandidates. The old mode with reco::Vertex IVF vertices is still supported but not used by default.
title: Updated PATSecondaryVertexSlimmer
